name: MemoCode
resume: A note-taking web application to store all your information in a unique and centralized space.
description: MemoCode is a full-stack web application built with React, Express, Node and MongoDB. It allows you to create notes, read, edit and delete them as long as you like all in a unique centralized place. It uses a clean and responsive interface.

name: StatMind
resume: A web application designed to track daily emotions and visualize personal trends through clear statistics and charts.
description: StatMind is a full-stack web application built with React, Express, Node, and MongoDB. It allows users to log their daily emotions and monitor their well-being over time. Thanks to statistics tables, users can easily identify patterns, better understand their emotional health, and keep track of their emotions daily life.

name: Greenier, please
resume: A web application designed to track daily emotions and visualize personal trends through clear statistics and charts.
description: Greenier is the result of an intensive hackathon challenge. Our goal was to raise awareness about the importance of sustainable development through an engaging and playful experience. Working in a multidisciplinary team of 9 people — including UX/UI designers, a game developer, and both front-end and back-end developers — we collaborated intensively to design and build a serious game around sustainability. The result is a project that not only highlights key aspects of sustainable development, but also shows how teamwork and diverse skills can come together to create an impactful and educational digital experience.
